item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (546 points | 120 comments)
2. Deegen: A JIT-Capable VM Generator for Dynamic Languages (33 points | 4 comments)
3. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (302 points | 204 comments)
4. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (306 points | 84 comments)
5. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (121 points | 41 comments)
6. The 'giant' river crabs that live beneath Rome's ancient ruins (25 points | 5 comments)
7. A 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (52 points | 25 comments)
8. The English Esoteric Programming Language (17 points | 6 comments)
9. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (300 points | 268 comments)
10. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (474 points | 125 comments)
11. Undersea Cables Connect the Global Internet (29 points | 9 comments)
12. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Operations Coordinator ( | hide)
13. Php.net Is Down (20 points | 13 comments)
14. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (226 points | 33 comments)
15. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (73 points | 31 comments)
16. This G15 is the Oldest Running Digital Computer in America [video] (4 points | discuss)
17. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (43 points | 13 comments)
18. 32k context length text embedding models (76 points | 24 comments)
19. Open-interpreter: A natural language interface for computers (5 points | discuss)
20. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (65 points | 1 comment)
21. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (87 points | 4 comments)
22. How to Make an STM (Scanning Tunneling Microscope) [video] (16 points | 1 comment)
23. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (190 points | 29 comments)
24. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (108 points | 47 comments)
25. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (59 points | 10 comments)
26. Async Django in Production (36 points | 13 comments)
27. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (2017) (76 points | 19 comments)
28. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (47 points | 4 comments)
29. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (153 points | 36 comments)
30. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (102 points | 3 comments)
